trans-unit.source: Start video playback automatically on page load. (If user device supports this feature)
Show information (title, etc.) from YouTube in YouTube player.
Show related videos from YouTube at the end of the video.
Set the correct aspect ratio of the YouTube video (width and height ratio).
Set looping on and off. (If user device supports this feature)
Title shown over the custom cover image.
Text shown over the custom cover image (under the title).
Custom cover image which is used in the frontend if it's implemented and enabled.

This parameter specifies the color that will be used in the player's video progress bar to highlight the amount of the video that the viewer has already seen. Valid parameter values are red and white, and, by default, the player uses the color red. Setting the color parameter to white will disable the modestbranding option.
